Getting Started
###############
These instructions will get you a copy of the project up and running on your local machine for development and testing purposes. See deployment for notes on how to deploy the project.

Prerequisites
^^^^^^^^^^^^^
What Prerequisites you need to install the software :

* Python 3.6.x
* NumPy Pkg
* PM4PY Pkg
* networkx Pkg

Tools used
^^^^^^^^^^
* Git
* PyCharm
* Google Docs
* `Trello <https://trello.com/b/DurR2w3x/anti-alignment>`_

Download the code
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
you can download the code from the repository at `Anti-Alignment-Repo <https://git.rwth-aachen.de/andrei.z/lab-anti-alignment>`_.
The repository contains the source code and testcases.

Project Documents
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
* `Project Initiation <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oLLI5VRgAnhYJSnFqGUo7mIAfOkoT9_8A6eRF_x_e0U>`_
* `Requirement Engineering <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1IWGxKjdESjc_ksnGnQiXLJ6Bh_weoCJkfTBWIwgo4l0>`_
* `Product Backlog <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1s6g7aWgGWZElVpPh25g8Ad-TbFfWjIPnXyASMs-HxUM>`_
* `First Sprint Planning <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1s6ShlVVOLqD-Q_3l4SapPAAuPo3X8JIQsJg5T3PnBqs>`_


Versioning
^^^^^^^^^^
We use `Git <https://git-scm.com/>`_ for versioning. For the versions available, see the tags on this repository.
